content: Another awesome chapter to this series. One of my absolute favorites. As usual, the storyline, graphics, controls and gameplay are well done. Has a fast travel map and a journal. The length is adequate, as is the bonus chapter. No issues. I pray the next chapter is sooner than later, has Jimmy in it, as well as the usual cast of characters, and perhaps you could bring Michael into the fold. Make it a family affair.
replyContent: Hi Susan! Thank you for such a detailed review! We are sure it will be helpful for other customers. Our team is already working on the next chapter!

content: Changing my review to 5 stars as they have fixed the issue of video not displaying properly on some tablets.

Way too big. I love all the Lost Lands, New York Mysteries and Legacy games. The frame for Lost Lands 7 is too large for my tablet. 1/22/21- Updated and everything fits. This episode of Lost Lands ties in characters from the first episode and gives some closure to the "loss" of an important character from episode 5. The puzzles in LL7 were not my favorites, but I am still going to replay it a million times as I have the past games. Best developer ever.
replyContent: Hello! The problem of incorrect screen resolution on some devices has already been fixed in the game update. Please, update the game on your device – after updating the game, the screen resolution should be correct. We apologize for this inconvenience and thank you for playing the game. Best regards, the FIVE-BN team

content: A couple of the later puzzles bordered on tedious but good otherwise
